content.html: Then should you just dispense with fight choreography because the natural way that people fight would be ruined by someone bringing it down to a technical level? I don't see him complaining that fight scenes aren't believable because of fight choreographers.
content.value: Then should you just dispense with fight choreography because the natural way that people fight would be ruined by someone bringing it down to a technical level? I don't see him complaining that fight scenes aren't believable because of fight choreographers.
